SELECT r.route_id, r.pro_seq, r.note,
p.pro_id, p.pro_nm, e.equip_id, e.equip_nm, d.product_id, d.product_name FROM process_routing r LEFT JOIN process p ON r.pro_id = p.pro_id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON r.equip_id = e.equip_id LEFT JOIN product d ON r.product_id = d.product_id ORDER BY r.pro_seq ASC
